name: Oros
description:
Oros

Move mouse so snake follows

Get Snake to the Goal

The longer the snake, the higher your score

press R at any time to restart the level

press ESCAPE to pause

Have fun!

This was made in 48 hours for Wowie game jam 3. The theme was "Failure is Progress" so I made a game of snake where you have to eat your own tail to complete a level. So failing to get the maximum score is still progress towards the higher level goal.

I did the coding and the "art". all music and sound effects was from assets by these talented people:

  • nolesound: music
  • ObsydianX: Sfx

Thanks for playing!!! Any feedback would be really apreciated!!
